description.en: This scroll permanently destroys an item and adds its appearance to your wardrobe.
description.ar: This scroll permanently destroys an item and adds its appearance to your wardrobe.
description.br: Este pergaminho destrói permanentemente um item e adiciona sua aparência ao seu armário.
description.cns: 会永久删除物品并将它的外观添加到衣橱中。
description.de: Diese Schriftrolle zerstört ein Item für imer und fügt das Aussehen deinem Schrank zu.
description.fi: This scroll permanently destroys an item and adds its appearance to your wardrobe.
description.fil: This scroll permanently destroys an item and adds its appearance to your wardrobe.
description.fr: Ce parchemin détruit un objet et ajoute son apparence à votre penderie.
description.id: Gulungan ini secara permanen menghancurkan item dan menambahkan penampilannya ke lemari pakaian Anda.
description.it: This scroll permanently destroys an item and adds its appearance to your wardrobe.
description.jp: この巻物はアイテムを永久に破壊し、その外観をワードローブに追加します。
description.kr: This scroll permanently destroys an item and adds its appearance to your wardrobe.
description.nl: This scroll permanently destroys an item and adds its appearance to your wardrobe.
description.pl: This scroll permanently destroys an item and adds its appearance to your wardrobe.
description.ru: This scroll permanently destroys an item and adds its appearance to your wardrobe.
description.sp: Este Pergamino destruye permanentemente un artículo y agrega su apariencia a tu armario.
description.sw: This scroll permanently destroys an item and adds its appearance to your wardrobe.
description.th: ไอเทมนี้ทำลายไอเทมอย่างถาวรและเพิ่มรูปลักษณ์ให้กับตู้เสื้อผ้าของคุณ
description.tw: 此捲軸會永久破壞一件物品並將其外觀添加到您的衣櫥中。
description.vi: Cuộn sách này sẽ phá hủy vĩnh viễn một món đồ và thêm vẻ ngoài của nó vào tủ quần áo của bạn.
